dialogue.speaker: Kaela
dialogue.text: Hello, Kaela. What can you tell me about the glowing blue river?

options.text: Ah, the river. It is a mystery even to me. Some say that it holds ancient magic, while others claim that it is a portal to another world. I have been studying it for years, but I have yet to unlock its secrets.

dialogue.speaker: Kaela
dialogue.text: Can you teach me any magic?

options.text: Of course, but be warned: magic is a powerful tool, and it can be dangerous in the wrong hands. Are you sure you are ready to learn?

dialogue.speaker: Gorm
dialogue.text: Hello, Gorm. What brings you to these parts?

options.text: I am a warrior, and it is my duty to protect the innocent from harm. I have seen many dangers in my time, and I know that this forest is not to be trifled with.

dialogue.speaker: Gorm
dialogue.text: Can you teach me to fight?

options.text: If you prove yourself worthy, then yes, I can teach you some of my techniques. But be warned: fighting is not a game. It is a deadly serious business that requires skill, determination, and courage.

dialogue.speaker: Lyra
dialogue.text: Hello, Lyra. What can you tell me about the thieves' guild in Gloomhaven?

options.text: I am not a member of the thieves' guild, if that is what you are asking. But I do know a few things about them. They are a secretive organization, with many powerful allies and enemies. They are not to be trifled with.

dialogue.speaker: Lyra
dialogue.text: Can you teach me to pick locks?
